title:
Along river road, there are many trails on the adjacent properties. Who owns this property?

Why can\'t we ride ATV\'s/4 wheelers there anymore without getting run off by the sheriff?

There is a lot of good riding trails there and there is no where else to ride in the wilmington area.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8765
